menu.description: Serves 2 | Experience the crunch with our Kurkure Cheese and Corn Momos! Delightful dumplings filled with creamy cheese and sweet corn, perfectly paired with a crispy covering. A flavorful twist that adds a satisfying crunch to your momo indulgence!
